GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves the corresponding article of the article_id requested in an object on key a of article

exampleResponse.title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy
exampleResponse.author: rogersop
exampleResponse.body: Bastet walks amongst us, and the cats are taking arms!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Allows user to modify votes on a chosen article and returns modified article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all comments on the article requested
